name: HENTAI - World War II
description:
HENTAI - World War II

In this third-person WWII-themed shooter and H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion is on a huge mission of clearing out the fallen city from enemies. There are a couple of winning strategies you might want to choose depending on the type of weapon in your hands. Choose wisely: there is no map of what's left of the city, and there is little to no information about how much enemies left.

STORY

The year 1941 is the year of creation of H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion.The city fell quickly after the nazi advent. The nation is desperate and there is no hope left. This is a dangerous path these Anime Girls took as our saviours.. So let's be wary, thought, enemies are now smarter then ever and there is no sense of begging them..
Join the H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion of the best Anime Girls out there and win this city back to our nation!

KEY FEATURES

  • Shooting game in the World War II setting
  • A variety of weapons to choose from
  • User-friendly and intuitive combat controls
  • Character in-depth customization
  • Heavily animated & with special effects

The game will cost only 1$ with 40% OFF(0.59$) in the first week, so feel free to add the game to your STEAM WISHLIST!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159640/HENTAI__World_War_II
